segments.text: I am observing a quiet domestic scene in a kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A woman stands at the sink, intently polishing a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is entirely on the dish in her hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink, it's completely overflowing!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring over the front edge in a continuous sheet onto the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has one foot right in the growing puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel that cold water seeping into her shoe?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly incredible how unaware she is of the expanding flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm actually getting quite worried about the potential for water damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is definitely going to slip if this continues.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is a little perplexing to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a disaster waiting to happen right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR
